title: 4Not forfeits to Rich Gang and Avant Garde

replies.body: Id like to see some wins for these guys, because its a shame when RG have some issues with verbal abuse and a team like this that does everything by the book don't get rewarded for their hard work.
I'm a sucker for the underdog story.  I keep watching their matches to hopefully catch their first 'W'!
Unfortunate. 4Not need to get a win under their belt, and this isn't helping :/
